pr_title: Spark: Default staging location in RewriteManifestsAction to metadata location

timeline.message: Spark: Default staging location in RewriteManifestsAction to metadata location

timeline.bodyText: What if we kept this and did a check whether the table implements HasTableOperations? Then we wouldn't need an unchecked cast.
timeline.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: We could but we use the same principle in a number of places, including the remove orphan files action.
replies.author: aokolnychyi

replies.bodyText: Instead of relying on TableOperations, we could check table properties directly too.
replies.author: aokolnychyi

replies.bodyText: My worry is that it may be confusing that we default the staging location only in some cases.
replies.author: aokolnychyi
